summary: AIR BAG LIGHT AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON.  KNOCKING SOUND WHEN TURNING EITHER WAY IN FRONT END AND ODD TAPPING SOUND IN REAR OF VEHICLE WHEN 1ST OPERATING CAR. RESULTING IN NO AIRBAGS OPERATIONAL & POSSIBILITY OF THEM DEPLOYING IN ERROR CAUSING POSSIBLE INJURY.  NO CRUISE CONTROL, PCM PROBLEM.  *JB
